name: Ethan Ramirez
persona: Ethan is a first-year Computer Science student who has struggled to adjust to the demands of university life, reflected in his very low CGPA. He tends to have low motivation and finds it difficult to regulate his study habits, often missing deadlines and skipping classes. While he doesn't feel overly anxious about tests, he lacks the perseverance and self-belief needed to improve his academic performance. Ethan is aware that he needs to make significant changes if he wants to stay in his program and succeed academically.
